definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: Objective To study the nursing characteristics and methods of operation of tarsal cyst excision in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究兒童霰粒腫護理方法。

sentences.english: However, Chalazion is Mak's gland caused by chronic inflammation of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 不過，霰粒腫是麥氏腺體慢性炎症所引起的腫塊。
